page.title: 04Homes 2 Shobdon and Byton
page.content:
The majority of people we asked (52) {lived in houses built since the war.
Only 5 homes were less than 10 years old, 24 homes were up to 20 years old, 15 homes were up to 30 years old, and 8 homes were up to 40 years old.
Of the remaining 26 homes; 3 homes were up to 100 years old 8 homes were up to 200 years old 3 homes were up to 300 years old 4 homes were over 300 years old but 8 people did not know the approximate age of their home.
All the homes except{1}had mains electricity. Only{2}did not have mains water. But{27}homes had no mains sewerage. {42}of the homes had central heating.
